divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from work with my girlfriend. The light. Shooting star. Cone flash, way to big to be a shooting, that shot right then made an immediate right angle turn, which i've never seen a shooting star do. Freaked out and scared, especially after how pale my girlfriends face was when i went to ask her if she saw it. The object seemed to leave the atmosphere.
Summary: cone flash that shot right then made an immediate right angle turn
